trans-unit.source: The <see langword="abstract" /> base class representing a field or a property to be extracted from a workflow instance and its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="abstract" /> 基类，表示要从工作流实例中提取的字段或属性及其关联的批注。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract> is the `abstract` base class from which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> class and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> class are derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract> 是 `abstract` 基类，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> 类和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> 类是从该基类派生的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> specifies a field or a property to be extracted from the activity associated with a tracking event and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> specifies a field or a property to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> 指定要从与跟踪事件关联的活动中提取的字段或属性，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> 指定要从工作流实例的根活动中提取的字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the annotations associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，获取与提取的数据关联的批注。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> associated with the extracted data.
Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information to associate with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 批注是您定义的 `strings`，它包含要与提取的数据关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the field or property to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，获取或设置要提取的字段或属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of a field or a property.
trans-unit.target: 用点分隔的字段或属性名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A> can be set to specify a field or a property; a member of a field or a property; or a single element of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A> 以指定字段或属性；字段或属性的成员；或者指定实现 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 接口的字段或属性（或其中任何一个的成员）的单一元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, a single element in an `array` may be specified.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定 `array` 中的单一元素。
